item.title: HowTo: Getting Jabber/XMPP notifications from your PBX
item.description: I just have to write up a quick post to show you JUST HOW SIMPLE it is to get interesting events from your PBX via Jabber. Right now I’m using it to notify me of anyone trying out my test ISN number, or whenever they join my conference bridge (good reminder if I lose track of time and forget that I scheduled some people to join my conference room).
